title: Unhandled Exception when closing mRemoteNG having multiple panels open
author: simonai1254
body_snippet:
## Expected Behavior
When having opened connections in multiple panels and then closing mRemoteNG through the Exit Button in the top right corner a promt is displayed for each panel if should really be closed. After confirming mRemoteNG should close.

comments.snippet: This issue might be connected to issue #2119

comments.author: djkraven
comments.snippet:
This happens when trying to close connection groups with open/active sessions under them. It isn't easy to reduce the connection group or get to an empty set and start over when a large group of sessions is open.

comments.author: robertpopa22
comments.snippet:
Likely same close-sequence crash cluster already addressed by close-panel hardening and follow-up main-close cancellation fixes: PR #3106 and PR #3124. 
 
Please retest on latest RC candidate build from fork. If no longer reproducible, recommend closing as resolved/duplicate of panel-close crash issues.

comments.author: robertpopa22
comments.snippet: This appears to match the same ConnectionWindow.Prot_Event_Closed disposed-object close-path as #3069. Candidate upstream fix package is PR #3106: https://github.com/mRemoteNG/mRemoteNG/pull/3106. After merge in parent, please retest on a build that includes that commit; if still reproducible with exact steps/logs, keep this issue open, otherwise close as duplicate of #3069.
